entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Menu Bar - ContentPage.MenuBarItems doesn't render on Android? #25516
  • [SF, Template] Additional discussions for the SF Template #25515
  • [iOS 18] Grouped CollectionView with header template and templateselector crashes immediately on iOS 18, works on iOS 17 #25514
  • FlyoutPage memory leaks - iOS, MacCatalyst #25505
  • [Testing] Write UI Test for https://github.com/dotnet/maui/pull/25453 #25504
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Gray Line Appears on the Right Side of GraphicsView with Decimal WidthRequest on iOS Platform #25502
  • iOS singleton dependency injection wrong lifecycle #25501
  • .NET MAUI SplashScreen PNG Resizing Incorrectly to Circular Shape #25500
  • [Android] Grid is resizing when tapped #25499
    Backlog
  • [Android] Grid is trembling #25498
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] RefreshView does not layout properly when it is placed inside a Grid #25496
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • 在Visual Studio上运行Android设备管理器中的仿真器时，出现报错，虚拟化各种服务均开启正常，请问应该怎么才能解决？ #25495
  • [ci] Validate the usage of all variables for public and private pipelines #25493
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [ci] Fix compliance errors #25492
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [ci] Improve CI agents and pools #25491
    .NET 9 SR1

Closed

  • Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #10238
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • ListViewRenderer Crash in HostApp #25421
    .NET 9.0 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • Android: Opt out of edge to edge enforcement on api 35+ #25517
    platform/android 🤖, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 9 GA #25509
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    community ✨
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Merged

  • Fixed UI Test Issue on Windows Platform in Visual Studio #25507
    community ✨
  • [main] Fixed UI Test Issue on Windows Platform in Visual Studio #25508
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25494
    community ✨, area-compatibility
  • 25421- ListViewRenderer Crash in HostApp and BindingError was occured in windows platforms #25453
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

Updated

  • Add New .NET MAUI Template with Syncfusion Toolkit Integration #25419
    area-templates, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Fix Button Regression with null image source #25485
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [iOS] CollectionView item sizing wrong after refresh #21736
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for TextDecorations not updating after modifying Label text #25339
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #2 #25378
    area-testing
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [NO_MERGE] WIP: Testing iossim hangs #25467
    do-not-merge
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25374
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #25340
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement Pinch gestures in UITest extensions methods #25316
    area-testing
  • [Windows] Fix Shell.Flyout menu disappears when pressing Alt key #25479
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area-testing
  • [ci] Build public #24388
    area-infrastructure
